page.title: 09OUR SCHOOL PART 2
page.content: THE {SCHOOL}OPENED IN 1866 WITH 11 PUPILS OF ALL AGES AND THE CHILDREN HAD TO PAY {1d.}OR {2d.}IF THEY WROTE ON COPY BOOKS. OUR{SCHOOL}HAS ALWAYS BEEN A {CHURCH SCHOOL} AND THE OLD BUILDINGS WERE PAID FOR BY THE CHURCH PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE. CHILDREN COULD NOT COME TO SCHOOL UNLESS THEY WENT TO {SUNDAY SCHOOL.}THERE IS NO SUNDAY SCHOOL IN 1985 BUT WE STILL HAVE ASSEMBLY IN {CHURCH} ONCE A WEEK. THE ORIGINAL BUILDINGS ARE NOW USED AS A {HALL} AND {KITCHEN} AN EXTENSION BUILT IN 1893 IS NOW A {COOKERY AND {TELEVISION ROOM} AND WE HAVE A { {PRATTEN HUT}BUILT IN 1962 AND ENLARGED IN 1969 AS OUR CLASSROOMS.
